description: The 2021 European Junior and U23 Canoe Slalom Championships are scheduled to take place in Solkan, Slovenia from 19 to 22 August 2021 under the auspices of the European Canoe Association (ECA). It will be the 23rd edition of the competition for Juniors (U18) and the 19th edition for the Under 23 category.
title: 2021 European Junior and U23 Canoe Slalom Championships
